title: World Fool News (TV)

alternative_titles.ja: ワールド フールニュース

synopsis:
Normally, becoming the anchor of a nightly news program would be a huge opportunity. However, Ichitarou Takahashi will be anchoring World Fool News, a program infamous for its low ratings and bizarre staff. As he settles into his new department, he finds that his coworkers are just as strange as the rumors claimed. But as he continues to work alongside them, Takahashi starts to realize that he might have found a place where he can truly belong.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
